title: LF Jungler D4+
body:
Looking for a serious jungler to fill our last role. 
Rank minimum: D4+
Role: Jungler
Must be prepared to learn as a team and improve
Must have skype or team speak
Must understand the role to a high skill level
Add: TG Kaneki for more information

replies.body:
Hey Kaneki, we've played before in solo que and I definitely remember your solid mechanics and positive attitude so I'd recommend this opportunity to anyone, I'm sure you have a great team going. I've attached my resume below, answering your questions and I hope that I may be picked as the perfect candidate.

I am currently 15 years old and I want to become a walrus. I know there’s a million people out there just like me, but I promise you I’m different. On December 14th, I’m moving to Antartica; home of the greatest walruses. I’ve already cut off my arms, and now slide on my stomach everywhere I go as training. I may not be a walrus yet, but I promise you if you give me a chance and the support I need, I will become the greatest walrus ever. If you have any questions or maybe advice, just inbox me. Thank you all so much ~~ And please no copy pasterino. 

Kind regards, 
The Doinksta

Dear Mr Bdoink,

You are the biggest troll in soloq.

Yours sincerely, Chad sucks

Dear Mr. Bdoink
 I think it is fantastic that you are becoming a walrus and living up to your dreams how ever if you do that you cannot be apart of this team as you wont be able to slide and flip along in the jungle with no arms and legs. We all hope you change your mind and continue playing DRAVENNNN to the best capability, We hope to see you again on the rift soon. 
Yours sincerely Kaneki

Hi I am interest in jungling for your team.

I have played this game since season 2, and have gotten cancer playing it since season 2. I have jungled in the proscene in 2014 and have ample amounts of experience fulfilling this role 

i hope you consider me as a player for your team 

~Cheers Autist

How did this get 14 upvotes in 2 hours. 
Unprecedented on boards.
difference between gold 3 skyprus and d4 mr kaneki
I'm just wondering the same thing.
doesnt have to be high skill level, mid gna carry anyways ^.^
was d3 last season. can jg elise fizz and more. pretty flexible with my champ pool.
I've seen you on spectate live and learnt a lot watching you. Gl on your team!
